channel.title: CVE Feed for DOS Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DOS Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22335|2024-08-02T10:07:05.996Z -- dos%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ss1%20and%20rakuraku%20pc%20cloud
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SS1 Ver.13.0.0.40 and earlier and Rakuraku PC Cloud Agent Ver.2.1.8 and earlier allows a remote attacker to bypass access restriction and download an arbitrary file of the directory where the product runs. As a result of exploiting this vulnerability with CVE-2023-22336 and CVE-2023-22344 vulnerabilities together, it may allow a remote attacker to execute an arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges by sending a specially crafted script to the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2023-22344|2024-08-02T10:07:06.133Z -- dos%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ss1%20and%20rakuraku%20pc%20cloud
item.description: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability in SS1 Ver.13.0.0.40 and earlier and Rakuraku PC Cloud Agent Ver.2.1.8 and earlier allows a remote attacker to obtain the password of the debug tool and execute it. As a result of exploiting this vulnerability with CVE-2023-22335 and CVE-2023-22336 vulnerabilities together, it may allow a remote attacker to execute an arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges by sending a specially crafted script to the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2023-22336|2024-08-02T10:07:06.153Z -- dos%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ss1%20and%20rakuraku%20pc%20cloud
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in SS1 Ver.13.0.0.40 and earlier and Rakuraku PC Cloud Agent Ver.2.1.8 and earlier allows a remote attacker to upload a specially crafted file to an arbitrary directory. As a result of exploiting this vulnerability with CVE-2023-22335 and CVE-2023-22344 vulnerabilities together, it may allow a remote attacker to execute an arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges by sending a specially crafted script to the affected device.
